photos.caption: My heart melts watching you cut your birthday cake while I clap like the happiest husband in the world 🎂👏❤️
The same magical moment captured from another angle - your smile lighting up the entire room, meri jaan 😍✨
You lovingly feeding me cake with your gentle hands - this sweetness will forever be in my heart 🍰💕
My turn to feed you while we both burst into laughter - these giggles are the soundtrack of our love 😄🎂💖
After all the cake fun, holding you close and kissing your forehead - my favorite place in the world 💕😘🤗

messages.title: Happy Birthday My Beautiful Aqsa
messages.subtitle: From Your Loving Husband, Umar
messages.letterSubtitle: From the heart of your loving husband
messages.blessingTranslation: (O Allah, bless her in her age)
